name: Fog Splitter
description:
This is a game where you build a train, fix the track, and shoot down the creatures of the fog. This is the first game jam (Global Game Jam 2022) I've done in a little over two years and I am fairly proud of the result. Happy to hear feedback and any thoughts in the comments, thanks! Oh! And thanks for playing!

----  CONTROLS ----

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Space or Mouse1 - Interact/Shoot

I've also added gamepad support but didn't test it!
